price: 72.Kaadu kaa (lac kinnuk) keenih qanneh, tokkel tu-kaak feeraanaah, tu-kaak yakmeenih.
arabic: وَذَلَّلۡنَٰهَا لَهُمۡ فَمِنۡهَا رَكُوبُهُمۡ وَمِنۡهَا يَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wadhallalnāhā lahum famin'hā rakūbuhum wamin'hā yakulūna
